ThingDef.label: aloe vera salve
ThingDef.description:
A soothing, all-natural ointment made from the gel of the aloe vera plant. Known for its healing and moisturizing properties.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 aloe vera salves requires herbal medicine for a total value of 50, and sells for 9, giving a <color=#33CC33>44.44%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 750 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.12</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>180</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.31</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: high fructose corn syrup
ThingDef.description:
A sweetener made from corn starch, processed to convert some of its glucose into fructose. Commonly used in processed foods and beverages, it enhances sweetness and preserves freshness.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 20 corn syrup requires 200 corn for a total value of 220, and sells for 25, giving a <color=#33CC33>56%</color> profit per unit.
